import Axios from 'axios' import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useInput } from '../Data/useInput' const dispensedItems = [] function Dispensed() { const [show, setShow] = useState(false) const [StockLimit, setStockLimit] = useState('') const currentStock = { BCG: 320, DMR: 490, IPV: 170, VAT: 900, DBCG: 805 } const { value: vaccine, bind: bindVaccine, reset: resetVaccine } = useInput(''); const { value: child, bind: bindChild, reset: resetChild } = useInput(''); const { value: quantity, bind: bindQuantity, reset: resetQuantity } = useInput(''); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() if(quantity>currentStock[vaccine]){ console.log("No way") } dispensedItems.push({ "VaccineName": vaccine, "childVaccined": child, "stockQuantityDispensed": quantity }); setShow(true) resetVaccine() resetChild() resetQuantity() } const handleApiSubmission = () =>( Axios.get("https://dev.hisprwanda.org/hiv/organisationUnits/").then(res=>{ setShow(false); dispensedItems.splice(0, dispensedItems.length) }).catch(error=>{ console.log(error) }) ) return (

Dispensed Vaccines

Current Stock

{Object.entries(currentStock).map(key => ( ))}
Vaccine Name Vaccine Stock Quantity
{key[0]}{key[1]}
{show&&dispensedItems ?
{dispensedItems.map(key => ( ))}
Vaccine Name Children Vaccinated Vaccine Stock Quantity
{key.VaccineName}{key.childVaccined}{key.stockQuantityDispensed}
: ""}
) } export default Dispensed
